${ModID}:ThrowHorseshoe.NAME: Throw Horseshoe
${ModID}:ThrowHorseshoe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a random card. NL ${ModID}:Increase_Mood by !M!.

${ModID}:ChainShotgun.NAME: Chain Shotgun
${ModID}:ChainShotgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:SpikeTrap.NAME: Spike Trap
${ModID}:SpikeTrap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal that much damage to the next enemy that attacks you.

${ModID}:Catharsis.NAME: Catharsis
${ModID}:Catharsis.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 random ${ModID}:Mental_Break and !M! random ${ModID}:Inspirations. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TradeBeacon.NAME: Trade Beacon
${ModID}:TradeBeacon.DESCRIPTION: The first time you draw or discard during your turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Sanguine.NAME: Sanguine
${ModID}:Sanguine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Increase_Mood by !M!.

${ModID}:BurningPassion.NAME: Burning Passion
${ModID}:BurningPassion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a Buff, double it.

${ModID}:RimworldKeywordManager.NAME: KeywordManager
${ModID}:RimworldKeywordManager.DESCRIPTION: Stuff for translations and easy access to keyword ids
